?! Interestingly I had faced this move a week previously in an OTB game. This move seems to gain nothing for black while helping white.
moves.7. Qg4 g6 8. h4: Building pressure on the king-side, all in keeping with White's usual play in these lines.
moves.8... Nc6 9. h5 f5: ?? May look tempting, but white is abound with tactics now.
